import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { ShopOwnerDetailsService } from './ShopOwner.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shop-owner-details-root', templateUrl: './ShopOwner.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ShopOwner.component.scss'] }) export class ShopOwnerDetailsComponent implements OnInit { title = 'shopownerdetails'; constructor(private shopOwnerService: ShopOwnerDetailsService) {} shopOwnerDetails: any[] = []; shopOwnerToUpdate = { id: null, ownerName: '', shopName: '', contactNumber: '', address: '' }; ngOnInit(): void { this.getShopOwnerDetails(); } // Register a new shop owner register(registerForm: NgForm): void { this.shopOwnerService.registerShopOwner(registerForm.value).subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Shop owner registered:', response); registerForm.reset(); this.getShopOwnerDetails(); }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error registering shop owner:', error); } ); } // Get all shop owners getShopOwnerDetails(): void { this.shopOwnerService.getShopOwners().subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Fetched shop owners:', response); if (Array.isArray(response)) { this.shopOwnerDetails = response.map(owner => ({ ...owner, id: owner.id || owner.ownerId })); } else { console.error('Unexpected response structure:', response); } }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error fetching shop owners:', error); } ); } // Delete a shop owner deleteShopOwner(owner: any): void { if (!owner.id) { console.error('Owner ID is undefined. Cannot delete shop owner.'); return; } console.log('Deleting shop owner with ID:', owner.id); this.shopOwnerService.deleteShopOwner(owner.id).subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Shop owner deleted:', response); this.getShopOwnerDetails(); }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error deleting shop owner:', error); } ); } // Edit a shop owner edit(owner: any): void { this.shopOwnerToUpdate = { ...owner }; } // Update a shop owner updateShopOwner(): void { this.shopOwnerService.updateShopOwner(this.shopOwnerToUpdate).subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Shop owner updated:', response); this.getShopOwnerDetails(); }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error updating shop owner:', error); } ); } }
